summary: Disables all Fast Travel, makes the game more immersive, Dawnguard works... :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2012/8/18/3338312/Descriptionv5.gif[/img]

[color=red] Warning: This mod can still work but this project has stopped and so I can not fix any bugs or so... Feel free take over this and fix if you want to, also don't forget to use my credits too. [/color]

Well, I couldn't stop fast traveling around so I created this mod to stop fast travel because it's like a self controlling lol, Fast travel ruins the game so that why i did created this. This one will disables all fast travel (includes Dawnguard and Heartfire too!). Used Creation Kit to disable some stuff to stop fast travelling, enjoy! :)

Also I recommend you guys use this mod and my mod togheter, so you can use more carrier and ships ^^
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15508]Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships by Alex[/url]

[quote][color=red] from Daiyus:
Just a note to everyone, always load this last. I really mean it. Other mods will reactivate Fast Travel if they're loaded after this. So far I've got "[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15508]Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships[/url]", "[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8088]Mark and Recall[/url]", and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18744]Handsx5 Divine Intervention[/url]" working with this, and it feels sublime. It's like Morrowind all over again! [/color][/quote]
[quote][color=red] from alb084: Works fine with hearthfire, at least I haven't got any problems at the moment. Good work !! [/color][/quote]

Install
~~~~~
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\
2. Check the .esp in nexus mod manager or launcher.

Uninstall
~~~~~~~
1. Delete the .esp file from \Skyrim\Data\

Changelogs
~~~~~~~~~~
2012/08/19 - The mod was released
2012/08/19 - Added Non Dawnguard! :)
2012/08/20 - Fixed some spelling error

Known Issues or Bugs
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Unknown yet but it can possible be some bugs, please contact me so I can fix bugs of this mod
